settings.title: TJ Maynes
settings.description: This blog is best described as a repository of written thought experiments from TJ Maynes.

author.name: TJ Maynes
author.description: TJ Maynes is a passionate, hardworking Software Engineer living in NYC. TJ specializes in product development, agile software methodologies and consulting. TJ utilizes test-driven development, pair programming and pragmatism to build software with people in mind. Also, enjoys writing software in a functional-style and drinking coffee.
author.news: Currently, TJ is consulting at VMWare (formally Pivotal Labs), writing in this blog and spending more time in the Spring ecosystem, Kotlin and Cloud Foundry.
